name: Phoenix Phight
description:
Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys to move

Left mouse button to shoot fireballs

Right mouse button to shoot a firewall (limited use)

Space bar to carry killed cultists 

How to play:

Kill waves of cute helpless little cultists and carry their corpses to the altar to sacrifice them. Once the cultists kill you you can upgrade yourself before the beginning of your next life by spending the souls from those whom you have sacrificed, but beware, the cultists used your strength to summon an evil god with the power to end your life for good. Kill or be killed... forever...

Made by Blaha in one day for the Brackeys game jam 2023.1 ( further updates may increase the wok time)
